strings.bioSADIE: Sadie is the responsible older sibling who’s always expected to watch her little brothers, but for once she’d like to have a life of her own.
strings.bioNOAH: Noah knows all the temple’s history and mythology and is the first to jump at the opportunity to lift Olmec’s curse.
strings.bioDUDLEY: Dudley is the funny, go-with-the-flow younger brother, and his older siblings are his heroes. He claims he can talk to animals, which may come in handy!
strings.helpDesktop: Arrow keys to move your character
strings.helpMobile: Tap and swipe in the direction you want to walk
strings.helpPush: Push stones to clear a path or activate switches
strings.helpStand: You can stand on switches to activate them too!
strings.helpRestart: Restart a level if you ever get stuck!
strings.restartConfirm: Are you sure you want to restart the level?
strings.levelIntro1: Watch out for Temple Guards! Guards will spot you if you step in front of them...
strings.levelIntro1_2: Since you have played every level, you can now skip levels with the SKIP button below...
strings.levelIntro2_1: Blocks can be pushed to engage switches too...
strings.levelIntro2_2: If you get stuck, you can always press the restart button and try again!
strings.levelIntro3: You can escape quicksand by moving quickly (double move) if you start to sink.
strings.levelIntro4_1: Key stones can be used on these tiles.
strings.levelIntro4_2: Lightly cracked tiles can be stepped on only once.
strings.levelIntro5: Some switches need a weight on permanently, others only need to be pressed for a moment! If you get stuck, restart and try another approach...
strings.levelIntro6: Push the blocks in the correct order to gain access to the Temple.
strings.levelIntro7_1:
I am King Olmec!
Who dares to enter the Hidden Temple?
strings.levelIntro7_2: Blocks can be pushed off edges AND into pits!
strings.levelIntro8: Sometimes tasks have to be completed in just the right order to proceed...
strings.levelIntro9: Look for switches that are safe from snake strikes!
strings.levelIntro10: Switches can control all sorts of things. Try and find a safe route to the exit.
strings.levelIntro11: Sometimes snakes are dangerous, but sometimes they show you the safe path...
strings.levelIntro12: Beat this level and you'll descend deep into the Temple to face the final test!
strings.levelIntro13: Complete my challenge to win safe passage home... otherwise you'll be trapped here for eternity!
strings.hint1: Enemies can only see you if you stand in front of them! Try to find another way...
strings.hint2: Try pushing blocks in different directions!
strings.hint3: Keep moving to avoid getting caught in quicksand... and stay out of sight of the guards!
strings.hint4: Try moving the block out of the way first - then don't double back on yourself over those cracks!
strings.hint5: You need to push blocks onto two of those switches - the third one you can simply step on!
strings.hint6: Plan your route carefully to position the blocks over the switches. You can restart as often as you need to!
strings.hint7: You need to get a block on to both switches... push the others off the sides if they are in the way!
strings.hint8: Once a block has been of use, sometimes you can dispose of it to clear the path!
strings.hint9: Snakes are only a danger if you stand in front of them. Look for the switches where you can't be bitten!
strings.hint10: The shortest path is not always the best. Try different approaches to work out how to reach the goal safely!
strings.hint11: Pay attention to the animal signs on the floor... the serpents on this level guide you to safety!
strings.hint12: Make sure you don't cut off your own exit, always leave yourself room to maneuver!
strings.hint13:
Use all of the skills you have learned.
Don't rush - think through each section of the level to avoid making mistakes!
